markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Duskwalker](/Traits.aspx?ID=257)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 267 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait has the duskwalker versatile heritage. Duskwalkers are planar scions infused with the supernatural energy of [psychopomps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=83). An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by duskwalkers.
name: Duskwalker
